properties.areaDesc: Breton Sound; Chandeleur Sound; Coastal Waters from Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 9:36AM CST until January 4 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 knots with gusts up to 30
knots. Waves 3 to 5 feet in protected waters, seas 3 to 6 feet
in open gulf waters.

* WHERE...Chandeleur Sound, Breton Sound, Coastal Waters from
Port Fourchon LA to Lower Atchafalaya River LA out 20 nm and
Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out
20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
